channel.title: How To Report A Compiler Error
channel.description:
To report a compiler error, please use the following format so you get answered best possibly:
[b]Screenshot of My Error in Compiler[/b] - How do you screenshot perfectly like other members do? Like only screenshotting a window? Download [b]!Quick Screen Capture[/b] here: [url=http://www.etrusoft.com/capture.exe]http://www.etrusoft.com/capture.exe[/url]. And get your screenshots the cool way.
[b]Screenshots of What I Did Before This Error Occured[/b] - Pretty self explainatory...
[b]Screenshots of The Code Around the Errors[/b] - Pretty self explainatory...
Thank-you and I hope everyone supports me on this format and I hope that this gets stickied.
~Nets

item.title: How To Report A Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

Nets8:

This isn’t the topic to report them, this is just a format to use when reporting compiler errors. But from the look of those errors I think your server is pretty screwed.

My Server isn’t screwed, plus i only added 1 new spell, using the ID 12987. since that spell isn’t present in my server. so i can just delete from SpellID and MagicID, and the problems would go away, thus having no new spell unfortunately =/. and i have backups of my server. Thanks for your help though.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Report A Compiler Error

item.title: How To Report A Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Yeah. I learn by making tutorials, examining tutorials, and helping others.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Report A Compiler Error

item.title: How To Report A Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

[quote=“Nets8, post:7, topic:87724”][quote author=Play N Skillz link=topic=128502.msg1246963#msg1246963 date=1177999551]
Actually, he still has hope. 100 errors is always something minor, such as missing a bracket }, or just something small.
[/quote]

Yes, but it’s always something you have to do on your own.[/quote]
Well, hey, that’s how most of us learn. A lot of the experienced coders here all made mistakes at first. You don’t improve by having others do it for you.
Just make a back-up and take a crack at it.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Report A Compiler Error

item.title: How To Report A Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

The other part:

[code]if(spellID == 12987)
{
if(playerRights <= 2)

sendMessage(“You must be teh x N00b to cast this spell!”);
}
else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“teh x n00b”))
{

hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(80);
castOnPlayer.inCombat();

first magicID then the spellID, i searched ice barrage and put it under it, might be a problem? i think so, but i rahter get your consent.

item.source: How To Report A Compiler Error

item.title: How To Report A Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

To report a compiler error, please use the following format so you get answered best possibly:

Screenshot of My Error in Compiler - How do you screenshot perfectly like other members do? Like only screenshotting a window? Download !Quick Screen Capture here: http://www.etrusoft.com/capture.exe. And get your screenshots the cool way.

Screenshots of What I Did Before This Error Occured - Pretty self explainatory…

Screenshots of The Code Around the Errors - Pretty self explainatory…

Thank-you and I hope everyone supports me on this format and I hope that this gets stickied.

~Nets
